column5: Guys, just wondering where you do your online shopping for components like beads, clevises, blades, hooks (Gamakatsu red #4), floats, weights, etc? I think the Fishin Hole is overpriced, there's gotta be better options out there? Or do you buy online from a place in the US? I'd prefer to shop in Canada to avoid the border crossing hassles with duty, exchange, etc too, but if someone can point me to a US site that has fair prices for this stuff, I'd looking into that as well. Thanks
Try Wholesale Sports On St. James St. at Wellington Ave. ask for Denis in fishing.
Send an email here. put in title "spinner components" he will set-you up with pretty much anything you want.[email protected]
I order from luremaking.com It's located in Hepworth in southern ontario
Thanks.....does this one have an online website? Or a catalog? I mean the [email protected]??
I also found that luremaking.com website, looks pretty good, only thing I can't seem to find there is Gamakatsu Octupus hooks....
No online website.. but im almost positive he can email you pictures of all the different colour combinations(he emailed them too me once) and he will custom paint anything you want.
